name: Tic Tac Adventure
description:
Play as Tic Tac to uncover secrets of this dangerous place! This prototype is an attempt at constructing a metroidvania level with an earlier prepared movement controller. Everything else - art, environmental mechanics, combat - was done in a week.

Please check out original creators (and respective games) of the music used in this prototype.

Credits:

Genshin Impact Chasm OST (https://youtu.be/Pdu4gEY8dRQ) - HOYO-MiX 

Forgotten Jade - Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night OST - Michiru Yamane and Ippo Yamada

Mirror Temple B-Side - Celeste - composed by Lena Raine, remixed by 2Mello

Razormind - Payday 2 - Simon Viklund

RUN! - Deep Rock Galactic - Sophus Alf Agerbæk-Larsen and Troels Jørgensen

Forge sound effects by Michael Freudenberg (https://www.youtube.com/@FilmMastersChannel)

Minecraft sound effects by C418

Machinery sound effects by The Orchard Enterprises Robotics

Various swing and hit effects taken from RPGMaker XP Runtime Library
